Transaction_State_Context.Deposit_State: When users deposit Ether using the `deposit` function, their balance is updated.
Transaction_State_Context.Withdrawal_State: When users withdraw Ether using the `withdraw` function, their balance is checked and updated.

External_Interactions.deposit: The contract accepts Ether from users when the `deposit` function is called.
External_Interactions.withdraw: The contract sends Ether back to the user when they call `withdraw`.
External_Interactions.migrateTo: The owner (creator) can transfer the entire balance of the contract to a specified address in an emergency.
